questions.text: Okay, now you've got the hang of it. Type a word that matches all three of the following: iron, lace, shower.

curtain.

	Did you ever wonder why curtain isn't spelled curtin? I guess it must come from French.

bird.

	Penguins are the only birds that can swim but can't fly. They also walk differently from other birds (upright).

plate&house&shot.
